description: This file defines an ASP.NET Core controller named AutomationRulesController that manages CRUD operations and toggling functionality for automation rules within a social media management platform. It exposes REST API endpoints for creating, listing, updating, deleting, and toggling automation rules, utilizing dependency-injected services.

classes.name: AutomationRulesController
classes.description: Controller responsible for managing automation rules via REST API endpoints, integrating authorization and route definitions.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new automation rule for the current user.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve all automation rules for the current user.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Handles HTTP PUT requests to update an existing automation rule identified by ruleId.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE requests to delete an automation rule identified by ruleId.

methods.name: Toggle
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to enable or disable an automation rule identified by ruleId.
